metadata.name: CAA Holiday 2022 with Cool Cats
metadata.description:
This holiday season, CAA honors caregivers with a donation in your name to #FirstRespondersFirst and CARE, organizations that provide support to those who help others in need. We partnered with three incredible NFT artists to shine a light on the caregivers and the frontline heroes in all our lives with unique and collectible works of art.
 
Cool Cats is a blue-chip NFT brand with community members from across the world. What started as a comic character has now grown into a globally recognized brand with digital collectibles, animated content, comics, games, and merchandise. Built upon a foundation of inclusivity, Cool Catsâ€™ vision is to become the leading entertainment brand that inspires coolness through community-driven storytelling, ownership, and innovation.
